title: Toxic Player ID: RgnLion
body:
Using offensive language, oral defamation to me in the game.
He intentionally dishonor me and calling my real name in front of two other unknown people. He hurt my reputation.
My friend was in the same game too so he will be a witness.
Riot please provide me a chat history/log to use it as an evidence, I will file the defamation case to the court.
The game was played between 9 pm to 10 pm in 9/May/2016

replies.body:
Hi Summoner,

The Boards are not the right place to report things like this
Also, can you please remove the name as there is a "[no naming and shaming policy](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules)" on the boards.

For cases like this, please send in a [support ticket to Riot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), detailing what happened as well as any evidence you may have (screenshots). Please keep in mind that player support is busy and it may take a lil while for them to get back to you (almost always reply within a week). During this time do not lodge multiple tickets or continue adding information to your existing ticket, as it may send your enquiry to the back of the queue.

In the future, be sure to use the end-game reporting screen as consistent reports through this feature is the best way to get a player punished. 

Due to privacy reasons Riot can't respond to your ticket with details about if a punishment was handed out or not.

Court more than likely can't help you for something like this and will just cost you money. Very few people would believe what some random negative player in game says about you.

Also please note that Riot cannot provide you another players chat logs as it is against privacy laws.

okay so people like you and riot will not be any help. I understand. then I will be the same person, who being a real toxic to me, to every other people in the game. It sounds like a kid but this will be much more fun aye? rather than just get stressed and wasting time to report people.
So all you said is if I am being toxic to other people, no one will stop me aye? got you! thank you for being real help

You seem to have misunderstood. 

We don't want people to start "witch hunts" for players, who might not even be guilty. But even if they were guilty, getting people to harass a toxic player doesn't fix anything. It often creates circles of hate and divided communities. This is why there is a no name and shame policy on boards. We only have your word on the matter.

Support on the other hand can see chat logs and the like and investigate the issue for you further. That said they won't be able to tell you of any outcomes, again because of privacy laws.

At no point did I say we would not help, nor did I say that if you are toxic you will go unpunished. I am simply directing you to the people who can actually help you in your specific situation. Rest assured, if you decide to be consistently toxic in game you WILL be punished for it.
